content.rendered:
Premium Quality Sublimated Lacrosse Shorts

Experience the ultimate in performance and style with our premium sublimated lacrosse shorts. Crafted from 100% polyester, these shorts are designed for athletes who demand the best. The two-button placket adds a touch of classic style, while the mesh paneling ensures durability and a reliable fit.

Advanced HD Sublimation and Customization

Our state-of-the-art HD sublimation technique guarantees vibrant and long-lasting prints that cover the entire garment. We offer extensive customization options, including labeling and branding on demand, allowing you to showcase your team or company logo with pride. Choose any color you desire to match your team’s identity perfectly.

Superior Comfort and Finishing

Enjoy unparalleled comfort with our quality flatlock work and neat seams, ensuring that these shorts feel as good as they look. The lightweight and breathable fabric makes these shorts ideal for intense matches and training sessions, keeping you cool and comfortable.

Wide Range of Sizes and Flexible Ordering

Available in sizes ranging from S to 3XL, our sublimated lacrosse shorts cater to all athletes. We understand the needs of our B2B partners, offering a minimum order quantity (MOQ) of just 40 pieces. This flexibility ensures you can order exactly what you need for your team or store.

excerpt.rendered:
Tailored for teams, ensuring optimal performance and comfort for athletes in sports.

  • Material : 100% Polyester
  • Style : Racer
  • Durability : Athletic performance & comfort
  • Embellishment :HD sublimation
  • Print Options : Overall
  • Customization : Labeling & branding on demand
  • Color : Any/On demand
  • Finishing : High end seams finishing
  • Sizes : S to 3XL (Available on demand)
  • MOQ : 40
